A dove with wings outstretched in flight, symbolizing freedom and hope. The wings could be made of intertwined hands, representing unity and interconnectedness.
A heart made of interlocking puzzle pieces, symbolizing the interconnectedness and interdependence of all beings.
A circle with a center point that represents the unity and wholeness of the world. The circle could be made of different colors, symbolizing diversity and inclusivity.
A flower with petals made of interlocking hands, symbolizing love and unity. The flower could be made of different colors, representing the beauty and diversity of the world.

A peace symbol made of interlocking circles, symbolizing the interconnectedness and unity of all beings. The circles could be of different sizes, representing the diversity and complexity of the world.
